channel.title: The Revolution
channel.description:
[i]Well, I got bored and decided to create one last server :P. I really have no idea how far I get on this one but I guess pretty far =D. I don't want really a lot of help, just help with a few errors and such. No one is to sign up, no list, doing all this for self coding experience. [center] [img]http://i9.tinypic.com/54ipdl0.jpg[/img] [/center] [b]Required:[/b] -A tutorial on specials, not Palidino's (++For help). CBA to code own atm =[.
[b]Latest Update: [b]98% RuneCrafting <3 Sick[/b]
[b]-Accomplished:-[b] -globalobjects.java -commandhandler.java -foodhandler.java -weaponhandler.java -weaponhandler.cfg -cooking -woodcutting -98% runecrafting -mining -like 20% range rofl -cleaned client.java (clues) -cleaned client.java (testing frames) -On top interface menu -ancient staff auto-cast blitz -master wand auto-cast barrage -fixed auto-cast timers -126 combat, 99 max stats -removed antilag.java and .class -basics of combat groups -npc training -50% own working vengeance -created illegal commands string -made server challenging -changed all commands in commandhandler.java all to 3 player rights -100% rs hits -unique starting area -unique pking area
[b]-Further In Process-[/b] -100% range -defense fully working -specials -skill capes (crappy kind) -rangehandler.java -rangehandler.cfg -full combat classes -pk reward and experience in quest tab ( 3 or 4 cases away) -fishing -fletching -cooking center -fishing center -woodcutting center -fix up jad -perfect timers -more to come as I think of them
[b]Pictures:[/b] -Tommorow -CBA rights now
If anyone can create a banner also, would be really nice, also of course a ++ I guess.

item.title: The Revolution
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:19, topic:125601”][quote author=revol 2 link=topic=175809.msg1617148#msg1617148 date=1184997266]
where we download it?
[/quote]
This is Server Development/Help, not RS2 Server Downloads, so there isn’t a download… If you would read, you’d see that he IS making a server, not HAS made one…

Anyways, Legend, I’ll make one once I get internet on MY computer working, because my CS3 trial ran out.[/quote]

When will that be =D?

*Update:
98% RuneCrafting <3 Sick

Read full topic

item.title: The Revolution
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:16, topic:125601”][quote author=ownage plz link=topic=175809.msg1616960#msg1616960 date=1184992933]
I have something that would help for rcing

public void replaceItem(int itemID, int newItem) { for (int k = 0; k < 28; k++) { if(ItemINslot(itemID, k)){ deleteItem(itemID, k, 1); addItem(newItem,1); } } }

or

public void replaceItemA(int itemID, int newItem, int Amount) { for (int k = 0; k < 28; k++) { if(ItemINslot(itemID, k)){ deleteItem(itemID, k, 1); addItem(newItem, Amount); } } }

[/quote]
First one looks really close to the one used in my Runecrafting Tut before the clean-out…

Anyways, GL Legend <3 :D[/quote]

:o Sick <3
Create a banner please =D?

Read full topic

item.title: The Revolution
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[i]Well, I got bored and decided to create one last server :P. I really have no idea how far I get on this one but I guess pretty far =D. I don’t want really a lot of help, just help with a few errors and such. No one is to sign up, no list, doing all this for self coding experience.
[center]

[/center]
Required:
-A tutorial on specials, not Palidino’s (++For help). CBA to code own atm =[.

[b]Latest Update: 98% RuneCrafting <3 Sick

[b]-Accomplished:-[b]
-globalobjects.java
-commandhandler.java
-foodhandler.java
-weaponhandler.java
-weaponhandler.cfg
-cooking
-woodcutting
-98% runecrafting
-mining
-like 20% range rofl
-cleaned client.java (clues)
-cleaned client.java (testing frames)
-On top interface menu
-ancient staff auto-cast blitz
-master wand auto-cast barrage
-fixed auto-cast timers
-126 combat, 99 max stats
-removed antilag.java and .class
-basics of combat groups
-npc training
-50% own working vengeance
-created illegal commands string
-made server challenging
-changed all commands in commandhandler.java all to 3 player rights
-100% rs hits
-unique starting area
-unique pking area

-Further In Process-
-100% range
-defense fully working
-specials
-skill capes (crappy kind)
-rangehandler.java
-rangehandler.cfg
-full combat classes
-pk reward and experience in quest tab ( 3 or 4 cases away)
-fishing
-fletching
-cooking center
-fishing center
-woodcutting center
-fix up jad
-perfect timers
-more to come as I think of them
